name: DEAD OR ALIVE Paradise
description: Indulge in some fun under the sun activities with the sexy girls from DEAD OR ALIVE®! On your own private island, you are free to mingle, flirt, play and take snapshots of these beauties. Store them in your one-of-a-kind private album along with video clips for viewing and editing later. Share an intimate experience with your girls by buying them gifts and have them model your favorite bathing suits while listening to your favorite tunes. Create your own private paradise in the palm of your hand. Take your girls anywhere...and play with them anytime.
